subject: [R] t.test
body:
Hi, how can I solve a problem without the function t.test???

for example:
x<-(1,3,5,7)
y<-(2,4,6)
t.test(x,y,alternative="less",paired=FALSE,var.equal=TRUE,conf.level=0.95)


--
